special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Aerisi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Howling Defeat
special_abilities.desc: When Aerisi drops to 0 hit points, her body disappears in a howling whirlwind that disperses quickly and harmlessly. Anything she is wearing or carrying is left behind.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Aerisi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

spellcasting.desc: Aerisi is a 12th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Aerisi has the following wizard spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

actions.description: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.
actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Bond of the Black Earth
special_abilities.desc: The burrowshark is magically bound to a bulette trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on its bulette, the burrowshark shares the bulette's senses and can ride the bulette while it burrows. The bonded bulette obeys the burrowshark's commands. If its mount dies, the burrowshark can train a new bulette to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

actions.description: The burrowshark makes three melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: When the burrowshark is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Brave
special_abilities.desc: Darathra has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.description: Darathra makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
actions.name: Heavy Crossbow

actions.description: For 1 minute, Darathra can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand Darathra. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Darathra is incapacitated.
actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Darathra adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Darathra must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Bonded Mount
special_abilities.desc: The knight is magically bound to a beast with an innate swimming speed trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on this beast, the knight gains the beast's senses and ability to breathe underwater. The bonded mount obeys the knight's commands. If its mount dies, the knight can train a new beast to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack
special_abilities.desc: The knight deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't incapacitated and the knight doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: The knight makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Lance

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: When an attacker the knight can see hits it with an attack, the knight can halve the damage against it.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Deseyna adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Deseyna must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.desc: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

special_abilities.name: Brute
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.

actions.description: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

special_abilities.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the minotaur moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
special_abilities.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.description: The minotaur exhales a cloud of burning embers in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc:
The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked unconscious or dies, it also reverts to its true form.
While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to poison damage, as well as resistance to fire damage and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. It also has immunity to the following conditions: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Olhydra's Armor (Human Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The fathomer can cast mage armor at will, without expending material components.

spellcasting.desc: The fathomer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has two 3rd-level spell slots, which it regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger (Human Form Only)

special_abilities.desc: Gar can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Water Walk
special_abilities.desc: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

special_abilities.name: Watery Fall
special_abilities.desc: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

spellcasting.desc: Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Assassinate
special_abilities.desc: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack
special_abilities.desc: Ghald deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't incapacitated and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

name: Grumink the Renegade
subtitle: Medium humanoid(dwarf), chaotic evil
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

special_abilities.name: Assassinate
special_abilities.desc: During its first turn, Grumink has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Grumink scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If Grumink is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Grumink instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: Grumink deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Grumink that isn't incapacitated and Grumink doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

special_abilities.name: Stunning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
special_abilities.desc: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Movement
special_abilities.desc: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

actions.description: Hellenrae makes three melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.desc: Hellenrae adds 3 to her AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit her. To do so, she must be able to sense the attacker with her blindsight. If the attack misses, Hellenrae can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within her reach.

special_abilities.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Movement
special_abilities.desc: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

spellcasting.desc: The hurricane is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: The hurricane makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

reactions.name: Deflect Missiles
reactions.desc: When the hurricane is hit by a ranged weapon attack, it reduces the damage from the attack by 1d10 + 9. If the damage is reduced to 0, the hurricane can catch the missile if it is small enough to hold in one hand and the hurricane has at least one hand free.

special_abilities.name: Empowered Attacks
special_abilities.desc: Imix's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

special_abilities.name: Fire Aura
special_abilities.desc: At the start of each of Imix's turns, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 17 (5d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 17 (5d6) fire damage if it touches Imix or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Imix moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Imix are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to him

special_abilities.name: Fire Form
special_abilities.desc: Imix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: Imix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Imix fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Imix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.desc: Imix's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Imix makes two slam attacks or two flame blast attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (5d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, range 250 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (10d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Flame Blast

actions.description: Imix summons up to three fire elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Imix, and disappear if Imix is reduced to 0 hit points.
actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)

spellcasting.desc: Lyzandra is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Lyzandra has the following wizard spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Club

special_abilities.name: Earthen Defeat
special_abilities.desc: When Marlos drops to 0 hit points, his body transforms into mud and collapses into a pool. Anything he is wearing or carrying is left behind.

special_abilities.name: Earth Passage
special_abilities.desc: Marlos can move in difficult terrain composed of anything made from earth or stone as if it were normal terrain. He can move through solid earth and rock as if it were difficult terrain. If he ends his turn there, he is shunted into the nearest space he last occupied.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Marlos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
special_abilities.desc:
When a creature that can see Marlos's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of him, Marlos can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if Marlos isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.
Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Marlos until the start of its next turn, when it can decide to avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Marlos in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If Marlos sees himself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of him and in an area of bright light, Marlos is, due to his curse, affected by his own gaze.

actions.description: Marlos makes three melee attacks, one with his snake hair and two with Ironfang.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Snake Hair

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage.
actions.name: Ironfang

special_abilities.name: Earth Walk
special_abilities.desc: Moving through difficult terrain made of earth or stone costs Miraj no extra movement.

spellcasting.desc: Miraj's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 14). He can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:
Miraj is an 11th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: Staff

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

special_abilities.name: Grasping Tendrils
special_abilities.desc: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.description: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) fire damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) fire damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target. A creature takes 4 (1d8) fire damage each time it ends its turn grappled by the roper.
actions.name: Tendril

actions.description: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.
actions.name: Reel

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Nurvureem can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Nurvureem fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.description: Nurvureem can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Each creature of Nurvureem's choice that is within 120 feet of Nurvureem and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Nurvureem's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Frightful Presence

actions.description: Nurvureem exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Empowered Attacks
special_abilities.desc: Ogrémoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Ogrémoch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Ogrémoch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Ogrémoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

spellcasting.desc: Ogrémoch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Ogrémoch makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. Hit: 46 (7d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Boulder

actions.description: Ogrémoch summons up to three earth elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogrémoch, and disappear if Ogrémoch is reduced to 0 hit points.
actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Empowered Attacks
special_abilities.desc: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Olhydra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Olhydra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Water Form
special_abilities.desc: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

spellcasting.desc: Olhydra's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Olhydra makes two slam attacks or two water jet attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone if it fails a DC 19 Strength saving throw.
actions.name: Water Jet

actions.description: Olhydra summons up to three water elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.
actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Chilling Mist
special_abilities.desc: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

spellcasting.desc: The one-eyed shiver is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The one-eyed shiver casts ray of frost from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also restrained. A target restrained in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.
actions.name: Eye of Frost

special_abilities.name: Grim Harvest
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

special_abilities.name: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast animate dead on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

spellcasting.desc: Oreioth is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

name: Padraich
subtitle: Medium humanoid(any race), chaotic good or evil

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, Padraich can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Maul

special_abilities.name: Searing Armor
special_abilities.desc: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

special_abilities.name: Shrapnel Explosion
special_abilities.desc: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.description: The razerblast makes three melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Spear

name: Renwick
subtitle: Medium undead, lawful or chaotic evil
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Renwick fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation
special_abilities.desc: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Renwick has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

spellcasting.desc: Renwick is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). Renwick has the following wizard spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Paralyzing Touch

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 10 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Warhammer

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Movement
special_abilities.desc: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

actions.description: The monk makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The monk adds 2 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the monk must see the attacker.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Shoalar can breathe air and water.

spellcasting.desc: Shoalar's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells:
Shoalar is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

spellcasting.desc: The Skyweaver is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

name: Stone Warrior
subtitle: Large construct, unaligned

damage_immunities.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
damage_immunities.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.desc: The Stonemelder is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional 1d8 for each level of the slot above 1st.
actions.name: Black Earth Rod

spellcasting.desc: Thurl is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Thurl knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Thurl makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Lance

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Tornscale can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.description: Tornscale makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Heavy Club

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spiked Shield

special_abilities.name: Funeral Pyre
special_abilities.desc: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

spellcasting.desc: Vanifer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Vanifer knows the following sorcerer spells:

actions.description: Vanifer makes two attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Tinderstrike

special_abilities.name: Brave Devotion
special_abilities.desc: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

spellcasting.desc: Wiggan is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.
actions.name: Wooden Cane

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

spellcasting.desc: Windharrow is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Windharrow knows the following bard spells:

actions.description: Windharrow makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

special_abilities.name: Air Form
special_abilities.desc: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

special_abilities.name: Empowered Attacks
special_abilities.desc: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.desc: Yan-C-Bin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Yan-C-Bin makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot-radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (9d6) thunder damage and be deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is deafened until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.
actions.name: Thundercrack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

actions.description: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.
actions.name: Change Shape

actions.description: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three air elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.
actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the bulette moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.description: The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.
If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Tail Stinger

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If Zegdar moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
special_abilities.desc: Zegdar can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, Zegdar can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.description: Zegdar exhales a cloud of burning embers in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Burning Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Gore
